title: Bronze 1!!!
body: The climb is getting more and more real each day, Sion is really doing it for me. :)

replies.body: Sounds filthy. What do you max and what offensive item do you build?

I go R-E-Q-W in lane and I dont build any offensive items, I just go flat AD marks and quints + any dragon bonuses, and thats all the AD I get. That is unless Frozen Heart counts as on offensive item, cos more CDR = more throwing creeps at scrubs.
Want me to lend you a hand ;) XD?
